public class InImapUserPreferencesStorage

A user preferences storage which uses IMAP as repository data

manolo

readUserPreferencesFromIMAP

protected static Object readUserPreferencesFromIMAP(org.apache.commons.logging.Log logger,
                                                    User user,
                                                    com.sun.mail.imap.IMAPStore iStore,
                                                    String folderName,
                                                    String magicType)
                                             throws javax.mail.MessagingException,
                                                    IOException,
                                                    ClassNotFoundException
Opens the IMAP folder and read messages until it founds the magic subject, then gets the attachment which contains the data and return the serialized object stored.

Throws:
javax.mail.MessagingException
IOException

saveUserPreferencesInIMAP

protected static void saveUserPreferencesInIMAP(org.apache.commons.logging.Log logger,

                                                Object object)
                                         throws javax.mail.MessagingException,
                                                IOException,

Opens the IMAP folder, deletes all messages which match the magic subject and creates a new message with an attachment which contains the object serialized
